title: Development and Application of Explicit Instruction Observation Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational methodologies and instructional design knowledge
context.additional_context: Need to enhance explicit instructional strategies for vocational science education

learning_goals: Participants can explain the core elements of explicit instruction (sequence, clarity, feedback)
